skill.name: agent.skills.primitives.Activate
skill.description: To activate a set of entities. The agent choose a the best positions to activate each of the issued elements. Upon reaching a position, the agent activates the corresponding entity. Upon action termination, the agents decides to move to the next one. When all entities have been activated, the skill ends and returns a 'done' feedback.

link.name: moveAndTakePosition
link.description: To enact the decision of moving toward the positions to activate obstacles.

link.name: observe
link.description: To enact the decision of observing the element to activate.
